thread.title: Jammu and Kashmir: Police search party kills two terrorists in Padgampora, recovers AK-47 and SLR
thread.title_full: Jammu and Kashmir: Police search party kills two terrorists in Padgampora, recovers AK-47 and SLR

author: FE Online
title: Jammu and Kashmir: Police search party kills two terrorists in Padgampora, recovers AK-47 and SLR
text:
Jammu and Kashmir: Police search party kills two terrorists in Padgampora, recovers AK-47 and SLR Jammu and Kashmir: Police search party kills two terrorists in Padgampora, recovers AK-47 and SLR Two terrorists were neutralised by the police in the Pulwama encounter in Jammu and Kashmir today. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 26, 2017 4:48 PM Police search party kills two terrorists in Pulwama. (ANI) 
Two terrorists were neutralised by the police in the Pulwama encounter in Jammu and Kashmir today. The terrorists were killed when they attacked a police search party in Padgampora. The area of the encounter has been sealed off by the search party. 1 SLR and 1 AK-47 was also recovered from terrorists that were killed in the encounter. 
Further details awaited.
